name: Mahjong Land
description:
Shanghai mahjong style game 'Mahjong land'
Competing with people around the world in Mahjong land!

Mahjong land is game to find two matching tiles. However, If the both sides are blocked or another tiles on the top the tile can not be selected.


* Feature *

-50 Stages
:50 towns in big land have all differnt shape of Mahjong pattern.
Also In the middle of journey there are some very difficult stages.
Please try to clear all 50 challenges in all the stages.

-Acheivements
: You just clear the stages?
You can also achieve certain conditions to collect achievement icons and gold.
There are 40 kinds of achievements that stimulate your challenging.
Let's collect all acheivements!

- Facebook Friends
: Your Facebook friends playing the same game? you can also compete with them. Mahjong land records your friends clear time in detail.
Now, compete with your friends and have fun together in Mahjong land.

- Compete with people around the world
: You wondering how good you are in Mahjong land? World ranked players records are stored In Mahjong land so you can compete with them.

-items
: What if there is no more move? There are Three items are available.
You can clear any stage if you use them in right time.
